import React from 'react' import SiteVersion from './SiteVersion' export default class Content extends React.Component { state = { isCreditsOpen: false } toggleCredits = () => { if (!this.state.isCreditsOpen) { document.querySelector('.credits').style.height = "7.2em" document.querySelector('.details1').style.height = "3.6em" document.querySelector('.details2').style.height = "3.6em" document.querySelector('.inc').style.display = "none" this.setState({gridTemplate: {gridTemplateAreas: ` '. . . .' '. littleTitle1 littleTitle2 .' '. details1 details2 .' '. details1 details2 .' `}}) } else { document.querySelector('.credits').style.height = "1.2em" document.querySelector('.details1').style.height = "0" document.querySelector('.details2').style.height = "0" document.querySelector('.inc').style.display = "unset" this.setState({gridTemplate: {gridTemplateAreas: ` 'inc inc inc inc' '. littleTitle1 littleTitle2 .' '. details1 details2 .' '. details1 details2 .' `}}) } this.setState(prevState => ({ isCreditsOpen: !prevState.isCreditsOpen })) } closeCredits = () => { } render() { return (

© 2019 Lee Perchino Inc. All rights reserved. {this.state.isCreditsOpen ? "Hide" : "Show"} details
